attributes.additional_details: Reducing or abolishing VAT would bring down prices, particularly of fuel. Fuel costs are why food is so expensive. At the moment people are finding it hard to keep up with rising prices, by bringing them down people will spend more and get money moving in the econoomy.
attributes.background: To help stimulate the economy, I think it would be a good idea to reduce or abolish VAT.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cut the standard VAT rate from 20% to 5%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617044

VAT Complete Removal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614072
